General.Name: Guangdong Golden Dragon Development Inc
General.Description: Guangdong Golden Dragon Development Inc. engages in securities business in China. It is involved in the securities brokerage; securities trading business; agency sale of financial products; future brokerage; investment banking; securities underwriting and sponsorship; financial consultancy; asset management; fund management; investment consulting; and private equity and alternative investment businesses. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Jintai Development Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Qingyuan, China.
